about_to_stake_units_to_cpu: You are about to stake {{amount}} to CPU.
about_to_stake_units_to_net: You are about to stake {{amount}} to Bandwidth.
about_to_unstake_tokens: 토큰 언스테이킹 할 예정입니다. 언스테이킹 된 모든 토큰은 72 시간 후 돌려받습니다,
about_to_unstake_units_from_cpu: You are about to unstake {{amount}} from CPU.
about_to_unstake_units_from_net: You are about to unstake {{amount}} from Bandwidth.
undelegate_explanation_message: Any {{chainSymbol}} unstaked from either Bandwidth or CPU will be unavailable for 3 days. After this waiting period it will appear as available.
unstaking_will_be_reset: 이 새로운 값으로 스테이킹 을 푸시면, 전 요청을 대체하고, 기다릴 72시간은 재설정됩니다.
will_have_less_than_one_unit_staked: You will have less than 1 {{chainSymbol}} staked to Bandwidth and/or CPU. That may prevent you from carrying out transactions when the network is busy.
will_have_units_in_cpu_after: You will have {{amount}} in CPU after.
will_have_units_in_net_after: You will have {{amount}} in Bandwidth after.
